column1: Traffic reports will resume Thursday November 10 at 6:30 a.m.

column4: Police will provide escorts along the following routes:
Approximately 10 a.m - 10:30 a.m.:  US-68 (Harrodsburg Rd and S Broadway) from the Jessamine Co line to Vine St to Quality St.
Time TBD after the first tree:  Southpoint Dr to Nicholasville Rd to S Limestone, left on Main St, to Triangle Park.
